# ISO 9241-11 Clause 4 – Effectiveness, Efficiency, Satisfaction

- **Effectiveness**: Accuracy and completeness with which users achieve goals. Metrics → task success rate, error rate.
- **Efficiency**: Resources expended in relation to accuracy/completeness. Metrics → time on task, number of interactions, assistance needed.
- **Satisfaction**: User comfort and acceptability of the system. Metrics → SUS, custom Likert questions, qualitative sentiment.

Keep these definitions handy when creating KPIs or acceptance criteria.
